Desc.entry: A service for adults with learning disabilities. There are places for 20 adults with referrals accepted via Neighbourhoods and Community Care Directorate. There are more places for those who can fund their places using direct payment or other methods. Aims to allow individuals to achieve new skills and build self-confidence through a varied programme of activities including self-advocacy, cooking, creative work and trips out. Encourages and works toward all members becoming more involved in the local community.
